comp.text: In order to keep you happy, Google will give raises, cash bonuses and stock refreshers yearly. You get larger raises if promoted

vac.text: Between 0-3 years: 15 days. 4-5 years: 20 days. 5+ years: 25 days

snacks.text: Fully-stocked mini kitchens (chips, cookies, fruit, etc.)

drinks.text: Juice bars, french press coffee machines, soda, juice, milk, bottled drinks etc.

retire.text: 50% match up to $9000 or 100% match up to $3000 (whichever is higher)

mental.text: Free 24/7 access to confidential counseling services

holiday.text: 12 days (New Year’s Day + 1 day, MLK Day, Presidents’ Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day + 1 day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day + 1 day, Christmas Day + 1 day)

phone.text: $70/month or go on their corporate plan

commute.text: Company shuttle. No public transit or rideshare options. Free parking onsite

leave.text: 18 weeks paid maternity leave, 4 weeks off before birth, and 12 weeks paid paternity leave. $500 baby cash

child.text: Free premium membership to Care.com and 10 subsidized days of in-home or in-center childcare

fam.text: Up to $25000 for agency fees or legal expenses. up to $25000 for surrogacy fees

onsite.text: Physicians and nurses for health & wellness available onsite. Onsite massage therapists and confidential counseling service

rec.text: Ping pong tables, foosball, arcades depending on building

edu.text: 1/3 off up to $1000 for non-work related courses, 2/3 off up to $10000 for work related courses

insurance.text: Basic vision: $0 ($150 for frames per year), basic dental: $0 (100% coverage for preventitive care, 60% off for major operations). General: $0 (Deductible: $1300/individuals, $2600/family)

hsa.text: gHIP plan members are eligible for a $1000 (single) or $2000 (family) contribution from Google

misc.text: Oncall pay at 1x, 0.66x or 0.33x of your base salary depending on the tier of your service, caps at 80 hrs per quarter. Free cooking lessons on site. Free fitness classes on site. Internet $ ($75/month)

comp.text: In order to keep you happy, FB will give raises, cash bonuses and stock refreshers yearly. You get larger raises if promoted

pto.text: Unlimited sick days. 1 month off every 5 years.

snacks.text: Fully stocked kitchens (chips, cookies, fruit, etc.)

drinks.text: Juice bars, smoothie machines, coffee machines, soda, bottled drinks, juice, milk etc.

retire.text: 50% match up to 7% of your base pay i.e. $3500 on $7000 contribution with a base pay of $100,000

mental.text: 25 free therapy session/year for you and dependents

holiday.text: 11 holidays (New Year’s Day, MLK Day, Presidents’ Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day + 1 day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day + 1 day, Christmas Day + 1 day)

phone.text: Free company phone with paid service

commute.text: Company shuttle. No public transit or rideshare options. Free parking onsite

leave.text: Mothers receive 16 weeks (~4 months) paid maternity leave plus 6-8 weeks of paid disability leave. Fathers receive 16 weeks (~4 months) paid paternity leave. $4000 baby cash

child.text: $3000/year for childcare expenses 10 uses/year of back-up care including in-home care for a child, adult or elder

fam.text: $10000 for fees related to adoption. $20000 for fees related to surrogacy

onsite.text: Doctors on call (health center at worki including prescriptions, vaccines, dental and vision). Barber on site (MLP office). Dry cleaning and laundry

insurance.text: Basic vision: $0 ($10 copay for vision exam, 25$ copay for frames and lenses, $150 for frames, $150 for contacts), $2000 for Lasik (1 time only). Basic dental: $0 (Deductable: 50$ in general, 0$ for preventitive care, $2000 max benefit/year). General: $0 (Single: Deductable: $250, max out of pocket: $1500) (Family: $500, max out of pocket: $3000)

misc.text: 250$ FB ad credit to use or give away. Laundry and drycleaning onsite and reimbursement. Free valet parking.

comp.text: Your comp should fall in a certain band, so yearly raise will be very little (1% - 3%). Raises when promoted (10% - 30%). If your stocks increase in value, no raise. No yearly cash bonuses or stock refreshers. Salary capped at $160k

vac.text: Between 0-1 years: 10 days. 1-6 years: 15 days. 6+ years: 20 days

drinks.text: Starbucks drip coffee, a variety of teas, hot chocolate mix, cider mix

retire.text: 50% match up to 4% of your base pay i.e. $2000 on $4000 contribution with a base salary of $100,000. Matches only vest after 3 years. Unvested matches are forfeited

mental.text: Free 24/7 access to counselling services through ComPsych GuidanceResources

spons.text: Will not sponsor SDE1 for greencard but can begin process. Will sponsor immediately for SDE2+

holiday.text: 6 days (New Year's Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Day)

commute.text: No company shuttle. Free Orca card (public transit). 160$/month rideshare reimbursement (Vanpool, Uber Pool, Waze, etc.) to work. 160$/month parking reimbursement (fully covers parking costs).

leave.text: 4 weeks paid pre-birth maternity leave, 10 weeks post-birth maternity leave. 6 weeks parental leave (mother or father), but none if working at Amazon <1 year.

child.text: Free membership to Bright Horizons child care centers ($250 value)

onsite.text: Some buildings have showers. Most building have bike racks. Open office or cubicles depend on your building

rec.text: Some buildings have ping pong and foosball

insurance.text: Basic vision: $3/month (Deductable: frames $10, eye exam $0, $130-$150 for frames or contacts depends on brand). Basic dental: $7/month (Deductable: single $50, family: $150, preventitive care: $0). General: $27/month (Deductable: single $1000, couple: $2000, single with children $2000, family $3000)

hsa.text: Amazon contributes $500 for individuals, $1000 for you and a dependent and $1500 for a family

misc.text: 10% off of $1000 of purchases per year from Amazon retail website

comp.text: You get a competitive base, sign-on and stock grant. You get respectable raises and bonuses every year

vac.text: Between 0-6 years: 15 days. 6-12 years: 20 days. 12+ years: 25 days,

drinks.text: Variety of bottled drinks, coffee, soda, tea, milk, juice etc.

retire.text: 50% match up to limit i.e. $9250 on a $18500 contribution

health.text: 800$/year on health and wellness. Free membership at the ProSports Club

holiday.text: 10 holidays (New Year’s Day, MLK Day, Presidents’ Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day + 1 day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day + 1 day, Christmas Day)

charity.text: $15000/year on donations. Donations for hours of volunteer work

commute.text: Company shuttle. Free Orca card (public transit). No rideshare options. Free parking onsite

leave.text: 12 weeks paid maternity leave and 12 weeks paid paternity leave. 20 weeks months if you are a new mother

fam.text: $10000 for fees related to adoption $50000 for IVF

onsite.text: On-Campus health access. Access to onsite clinic, nurses and physicians

rec.text: Lots of xboxes, pool tables, arcade machines, ping pong tables etc.

edu.text: $5250 for undergraduate coursework $10000 for graduate coursework

insurance.text: Basic vision: $0 ($10 copay for vision exam, 25$ copay for frames and lenses, $150 for frames, $150 for contacts), $2000 for lasik (1 time only). Basic dental: $0 (Deductable: 50$ in general, 0$ for preventitive care, $2000 max benefit/year). General: $0 (Deductable: single $250, max out of pocket: $1500, family $500, max out of pocket: $3000)

comp.text: You get a huge initial stock grant. You also get raises, cash bonuses and large stock refreshers yearly.

snacks.text: Fully stocked kitchens (chips, cookies, fruit etc.)

drinks.text: Variety of bottled drinks, coffee, soda, tea, milk, juice etc.

health.text: $68/month on fitness gear, gym memberships etc.

holiday.text: 10 days (New Year’s Day, MLK Day, Presidents’ Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day + 1 day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day + 1 day, Christmas Day)

commute.text: No public transportation benefits. 17% discount on Uber rides, $200 Uber credits/month, free Uber rides from nearby public transportation stations to offices. Tax deduct $265/month for parking, ridesharing, etc.

leave.text: 18 weeks paid parental leave (2019). $500 towards Uber Eats

fam.text: Up to $10000 for adoption, surrogacy or IVF

onsite.text: Offices are generally smaller and open office, still has a startup vibe. Convenient downtown location. Shower and gym at 555 Market Street location

insurance.text: Basic vision: $0 (eye exam copay: $10, $130 allowance for frames or contacts). Basic dental: $0 (Deductable: $50, preventative care $0). General: $0 (Deductable: single $1500, family $1500)

hsa.text: Uber contributes $750/individual or $1500/family to your HSA

misc.text: 100% covered wearable breast pumps by Willow

comp.text: Solid base pay, sign-on, target bonus, and RSUs. Near but not quite at FAANG levels. Annual raises and stock refreshers

pto.text: Unlimited PTO, 4 week sabbatical after 5 years, 5 weeks after 10 years, 6 weeks after 15+ years

snacks.text: Fully stocked kitchens (chips, cookies, fruit etc.)

drinks.text: Variety of bottled drinks, coffee, soda, tea, milk, juice etc.

retire.text: Matches 50% of first 6% or up to 3% of base pay

health.text: Onsite gyms, $360/year for health and wellness

holiday.text: 20 days (New Year’s Day, MLK Day, Presidents’ Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day + 1 week, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day + 1 week)

commute.text: Company shuttle. $150 for commute, free CalTrain pass. $10 discounted parking. Emergency ride home reimbursement

leave.text: Up to 26 weeks for birth mothers. 16 weeks of paid parental leave within 6 months of the birth or placement of a child under 6 years old

child.text: Bright Horizons discounts, dependent care FSA ($1200 contribution by Adobe, $5000 pretax money can be set aside)

fam.text: Up to $25000 per adoption (up to 2 adoptions). Up to $25000 per surrogacy event (up to 2 times)

onsite.text: Large vibrant offices, fairly open office-styled

edu.text: $10000 one-time reimbursement for educational debt. $10000/year for continuing education. $1000/year for professional development

hsa.text: Adobe contributes up to $850 for individual and up to $1,700 for family with Aetna

misc.text: Purchase stock at a discount (ESP). Free Adobe Creative Cloud. Discounts on a variety of things using Fond

comp.text: Target refreshers/year based on performance can be as high as 100% of base salary in RSUs/4 years. Average ratings might mean ~50% of base salary in refreshers

drinks.text: Varies, good locations have soda, milk. All locations have coffee

retire.text: Between 0-4 yrs: 3% match to your base salary. 4+ yrs: 6% match to your base salary

health.text: Subsidized onsite gym: $9/month. $300/yr if location doesn't have an onsite gym

holiday.text: 2 weeks of shutdown (Thanksgiving and Christmas) + 5 holidays (New Year's Day, MLK Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day)

phone.text: Carrier discount plan. 25% off Apple devices (once per year) including iPhones

commute.text: Company shuttle and free parking. $100/month for transportation including public transit and ridesharing

leave.text: 18 weeks for paid maternity leave, 6 weeks of paid paternity leave

child.text: Set aside $5000 in pre-tax dollars for daycare and ten days of “backup care” for elders and children

onsite.text: Offices are very new. Apple park is a huge facility with it's own unique vibe. Lots of greenspace and a pond around a massive circular facility

rec.text: Olympic-size swimming pool - otherwise most locations don't have recreational activities

misc.text: Use up to 10% of your salary to buy some stock at 15% discount off lowest price of the period

comp.text: Biggest raises come with promotions! Top tier (top 20%) get refreshers otherwise you don't get very much

meals.text: Reputation for having amazing food. Free breakfast, lunch and dinner (starts 7pm)

snacks.text: Comprehensive set of snacks, cookies, ice cream, etc. as well as healthy options such as smoothies, fruit, protein bars

drinks.text: Variety of bottled drinks, coffee, soda, milk juice etc. Select locations may have kombucha, smoothie bars and extensive expresso machines

retire.text: 50% match up to IRS limit. $9250 with a $18500 contribution

health.text: $2000 towards fitness classes, memberships, massages, gym etc.

holiday.text: 17 paid holidays including fully paid July 4th and end of year shutdown

commute.text: Company shuttle. $125 for public transportation in SF, free CalTrain pass. Free parking

child.text: Childcare can be expensed as part of $2000 perk-up bonus

onsite.text: Beautiful renovated offices in both Sunnyvale & San Francisco. Unique architecture and layout results in a vibrant dynamic work environment. Roof views, onsite gyms and quiet areas are nice touches. Onsite dental, car wash, dry cleaning and oil changes

rec.text: Foosball tables, music lessons/jam room, massage rooms (depending on location)

insurance.text: Basic coverage is fully covered. No full details on coverage numbers

misc.text: 15% off stock off the lowest market price in the last record period. Free LinkedIn Premium subscription
